 [Pages](https://www.palousewa.gov/pages/)City Codes

City Codes
==========

### [Palouse Municipal Code:](http://www.codepublishing.com/wa/palouse/) View the fully published Municipal Code online.

**Notice:**The Palouse City Clerk’s Office has the official version of the Palouse Municipal Code.

**Here are some specific excerpts from the local Codes that the City of Palouse and the Palouse Police Department would like residents and visitors to be aware of:**

[Chapter 6.08](http://www.codepublishing.com/wa/palouse/?Palouse06/Palouse0608.html) Dogs

[Chapter 8.12](http://www.codepublishing.com/wa/palouse/?Palouse08/Palouse0812.html) Public Nuisances

[Chapter 9.72](http://www.codepublishing.com/wa/palouse/?Palouse09/Palouse0972.html) Minors and Weapons

[Chapter 9.88](http://www.codepublishing.com/wa/palouse/?Palouse09/Palouse0988.html) Discharge of Firearms

[Chapter 10.24](http://www.codepublishing.com/wa/palouse/?Palouse10/Palouse1024.html) Turning Movements

[Chapter 10.64](http://www.codepublishing.com/wa/palouse/?Palouse10/Palouse1064.html) Abandoned Vehicles

[Chapter 12.10](http://www.codepublishing.com/wa/palouse/?Palouse12/Palouse1210.html) Snow and Ice Removal

Comments are closed.

### Find Us

### Palouse City Hall

East 120 Main Street  
P.O Box 248  
Palouse, WA 99161

**City Hall Hours:**  
Monday through Friday,  
9:00 am to 4:00 pm
